name: RescueOne - Helicopter rescues
description:
Become the pilot of a rescue helicopter with realistic feel and controls.

First learn to fly, and then complete missions ranging from rescuing injured hikers, helping ranchers, and assisting the police.  Avoid hitting trees, buildings and other objects.

Complete with missions, animations and cut-scenes.

Note:  Starting the game for the first time may be slow, please be patient.
